name: Granulomatous Myocarditis with Conduction System Involvement
chief_complaint: I keep feeling like my heart is skipping beats and I'm so tired I can barely walk to the bathroom
prognosis: Guarded - depends on response to immunosuppression and degree of myocardial fibrosis. High risk for progression to complete heart block or dilated cardiomyopathy.
description: A rare inflammatory condition characterized by non-caseating granulomas infiltrating the myocardium and conduction system, often with associated systemic sarcoidosis. Leads to arrhythmias, conduction abnormalities, and progressive heart failure through direct tissue destruction and fibrosis.
